ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Urban Legends
ComicInfo.Summary:
Welcome to Chicago! Hot on the trail of bat-Splinter, the Turtles find themselves embroiled in a new mystery when a string of killings points to a mythic villain... a vampire! But just like the Turtles themselves, things arenâ€™t always what they seem...
